After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Total number of on-demand service requests received over a specific period, indicating the demand for on-demand services.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: Total Number of On-Demand Service Requests Received

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to respond to on-demand service requests from the time of request to initial contact, reflecting responsiveness to customer needs.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: Average Time Taken to Respond to On-Demand Service Requests

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the on-demand service experience, including service quality, response time, and overall satisfaction, gathered through surveys and feedback.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: Average Customer Satisfaction Score for On-Demand Services

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Percentage of on-demand service requests completed compared to the total number of requests received, reflecting the success of fulfilling service requests.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: (Number of Completed On-Demand Services / Total Number of On-Demand Service Requests) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from on-demand services.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from on-demand services compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: (Revenue from On-Demand Services - Cost of On-Demand Services) / Cost of On-Demand Services * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each on-demand service provided, including labor, parts, and administrative expenses.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: Total Cost of On-Demand Services / Total Number of On-Demand Services

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Degree to which on-demand services adhere to established service standards, measured through audits and performance evaluations.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: (Number of Compliant On-Demand Services / Total Number of On-Demand Services) * 100

After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.KPIS: On-demand service improvement initiatives success rate.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.EXPLANATION: Percentage of improvement initiatives for on-demand services that achieve their objectives, based on project outcomes and effectiveness.
After Sales+Mobile Services+On-Demand Se.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Improvement Initiatives / Total Number of Improvement Initiatives) * 100
